column4: is it possible to repair ubuntu 11.10 by a live cd ? http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=157250 :: What packages must be installed to get the login mask?
google for chroot ubuntu live. that's the solution you're looking for for system recovery

rhorstkoetter, escott thanks a lot, i had ubuntu 11.04 running for a longer time, got an upgrade message, said ok, then unity installed back, after remove of the packages i cannot log in any more. ok, thanks for the confirmation, i'll try a knoppix usb live + chroot !
you may use ubuntu live as well
